actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat certain income derived by tax-exempt organizations from investments in farmland as unrelated business taxable income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to tax the unrelated income of tax-exempt organizations which is derived from farm real property.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat certain income derived by tax-exempt organizations from investments in farmland as unrelated business taxable income.
